trans-unit.source: A formatter that serializes a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.ServiceDocument"></xref> instance to and from XML using Atom 1.0 formats.

Use this class to serialize instances of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.ServiceDocument> to XML and to generate instances of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.ServiceDocument> from an XML document.

If you want to serialize or deserialized an object derived from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.ServiceDocument>, use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.AtomPub10ServiceDocumentFormatter%601> formatter instead.
Creates a new instance of the Atom 1.0-based <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.ServiceDocumentFormatter"></xref> class.
Creates a new instance of the Atom 1.0-based <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.ServiceDocumentFormatter"></xref> class to serialize a specified service document.
The `documentToWrite` can be serialized to an XML representation or deserialized from an XML representation by the formatter using Atom 1.0 formats.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.ServiceDocument"></xref> associated with the Atom 1.0 formatter.
documentToWrite is `null`.
Creates a new instance of the Atom 1.0-based <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.ServiceDocumentFormatter"></xref> class.
The `documentTypeToCreate` can be serialized to an XML representation or deserialized from an XML representation by the formatter using Atom 1.0 formats.
The instance of an object that is derived from a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.ServiceDocument"></xref> type that is associated with the Atom 1.0 formatter.
documentTypeToCreate is `null`.
documentTypeToCreate specified is not valid.
Tests whether the specified XML reader contains a valid service document.
The XML reader.
`true` if the XML reader does contain a valid service document; otherwise `false`.
reader is `null`.
Creates a new <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.ServiceDocument"></xref> instance associated with the Atom 1.0 formatter.
Returns an instance of a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.ServiceDocument"></xref>.
Generates a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.ServiceDocument"></xref> object from a specified XML reader.
The XML reader from which to read the syndication feed.
reader is `null`.
The XML could not be parsed.
Gets the name of Atom Publishing Protocol namespace.
Returns "http://www.w3.org/2007/app".
Writes a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.ServiceDocument"></xref> object associated with the formatter to a specified XML writer.
The XML writer written to by the formatter.
writer is `null`.
The service document associated with the formatter is `null`.
This method is reserved and should not be used.
Explicitly implements the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.GetSchema%2A> method.
Returns `null`.
Generates a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.ServiceDocument"></xref> from its XML representation.
Explicitly implements the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.ReadXml%2A> method.
The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref> stream from which the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.ServiceDocument"></xref> object is deserialized.
reader is `null`.
Converts the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.ServiceDocument"></xref> into its XML representation.
Explicitly implements the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.WriteXml%2A> method.
The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlWriter"></xref> stream to which the object is serialized.
writer is `null`.
There is no instance of a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.ServiceDocument"></xref> associated with the formatter.
